ðŸ“– Summary: Supervision is a Python package providing reusable computer vision tools. It offers model-agnostic connectors for popular libraries and customizable annotators, simplifying tasks such as loading datasets, visualizing detections, and counting objects in images and videos. It aims to streamline computer vision workflows.
